tool_description: Validates figures, tables, and their captions for proper academic formatting, numbering, and cross-reference compliance.

style_guide.description: Style guide for figure/table formatting: APA, MLA, Chicago, or IEEE

check_captions.description: Whether to validate caption format and completeness

check_references.description: Whether to validate in-text references to figures/tables

error_messages: Empty document: Document text cannot be empty.
Unsupported style guide: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, IEEE].
No figures or tables found: Document does not contain identifiable figures or tables.
Document too large: Text exceeds maximum length for processing.
usage: Provide document_text and style_guide to validate all figures and tables. Configure validation options as needed for comprehensive checking.
